item.title: view.adtmt.com
item.dc:creator: JohnWorfin
item.description:
danielsangeo:

You said “luckily I use a Mac” and that sounds like elitist bullshit and operating system superiority that you claimed to be against.

It only sounds elitist to people who are a little insecure about their OS.
To those who run OSX, weather on an actual mac or any run of the mill “PC”, not having a giant malware target can be nice.
I if had said something to the tune of, “Luckily I’m not a knuckle dragging windows user that can’t see past my over sized brow ridge enough to realize that Bill Gate’s nipple hair is getting stuck between my wide Neanderthal like teeth.” That would be elitist. But I have said no such thing. remember, I still run windows on my mac to play most of my wonderful computer games.
And I’m very proud of you for learning to use your computer so well.

Read full topic

BMS forums FTW

item.title: view.adtmt.com
item.dc:creator: Naked_Shooter
item.description:
JohnWorfin, I’m sorry to break it to you, but you really are the stereotypical Mac elitist. I had to work on a Mac for a summer, and it was really fucking bad. Apple milks its customers way more than ‘microshaft’. I had more than enough time to get used to working on the mac, and I did, but still thought the experience was much like scraping your eye with a dick.

Switching between windows is a pain. Most programs open multiple seemingly separate windows, and when you bring up the gird of open ‘things’, it’s a mess. It’s modularity in excess.

Speaking of modularity, the mac hardware lacks it. The hardware isn’t special, (the only extraordinary thing about it was the monitor), but it’s overpriced. Sure, there are advantages to building your system around parts that you KNOW will be there (like a specific graphics card), but the same parts can be used with a PC, and you don’t get fucked over.

The version of OSX we had installed was fairly resent, but our shit got delayed cause to use XCode, Apple makes you BUY what is the Mac equivalent of a Service Pack (Snow Leopard). Yeah, I guess if I worked with it for years I might have gotten used to it, but it is definitely more stressful, and in my opinion, more shitty.

If I wanted unix, I’d install it on my PC. I didn’t hate Macs, I’m not an ‘apologist’ or an elitist, I have a fairly open mind. However, it’s true that a lot of Mac users are self-righteous douche bags. At least you looked up reasons to like a Mac, some just baselessly point and laugh at PC users.

Also, Christian masses? What the fuck? I’m glad you throw everyone that you consider to be ignorant and sheepish into one big pile, which you consider it ok to shit upon when you feel like getting an ego boost. Good luck with that.

Read full topic

item.title: view.adtmt.com
item.dc:creator: JohnWorfin
item.description:
OrderOfDagon:

Though I want judge you, macs are horrible.
I can do anything a mac can do on my PC, better and faster than your mac.
Yes, even movie making.
Not to mention I can upgrade without having to buy a whole new computer – I don’t know if they still do that.

I won’t judge you for being a pc apologist. It is not faster or better, just the standard that windows tries to catch. Upgrades are the same for ANY pc, easy, and I don’t require third party ad blockers but none of this is actually why I posted here.

Read full topic

item.title: view.adtmt.com
item.dc:creator: JohnWorfin
item.description:
Maverix26:

Oh hi, i’m assuming you’re one of the ignorant mass that actually believe that macs are better because they’re slim, and shiny.

How do you even plan on playing the mod on a mac?

Oh hai, if you are one of the ignorant Christian masses who believe that the mod can’t be played on a mac then I suggest you go to school (if you aren’t ignorant enough to locate one) and learn to read, then read up on macs.
And they aren’t better because they are slim and shiny, but because they are really well built, have a great OS that microshaft is constantly trying to emulate and that does not require ad blockers (because it prompts, rather that automatically downloading crap if there is no third party ad blocking software installed) and if you open a command terminal, you are in UNIX, the most powerful and stable os ever built. But none of this is why i posted here. Thanks for reinforcing the ignorant stereotype of both the followers of the god of Abraham and rabbid bill gates fanboys
